question: Union Public Service Commission may perform the work of a State Public Service Commission:
option1: Only if Parliament by law, so prescribes
option2: On request of Governor of a State with approval from President
option3: If a state Legislature passes a resolution by an absolute majority
option4: If a state Legislature passes a resolution by an absolute majority subject to approval from Governor of the State
answer: On request of Governor of a State with approval from President
explanation: Second option is the correct answer
